parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Host
parameter.description: Network address or host name of the bridge.

parameter.name: connectionDelay
parameter.label: Connection delay
parameter.description: Time between binding initialization and first connection attempt (seconds, 0-120).

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh interval
parameter.description: Time between requests to refresh information from the bridge (seconds, 1-3600).

parameter.name: connectionTimeout
parameter.label: Connection timeout
parameter.description: Time before connection attempts are aborted (seconds, 1-3600).

parameter.name: requestTimeout
parameter.label: Request timeout
parameter.description: Time before pending requests are aborted (seconds, 1-3600).

parameter.name: idleTimeout
parameter.label: Idle timeout
parameter.description: Time before connections are closed due to inactivity (seconds, 1-3600).

parameter.name: id
parameter.label: ID
parameter.description: The unique id assigned to this device by the bridge.
